name: The Backrooms: Liminal Reality
description:
A single player horror experience that will take you on a journey through liminal space. As you enter this dream-like world, you will find yourself in a place where everything feels unreal and unsettling. The atmosphere will make you feel as if you are in a dream, or if you have just entered one of your own.

As you explore the levels, you will encounter surreal landscapes and hidden secrets. The game's graphics are stunning, and the sound design is expertly crafted to enhance the eerie atmosphere. The gameplay is designed to be both challenging and engaging, as you try to find a way out of this nightmare world.



Try your best to find your way out of the backrooms and fight with the mixed feelings the backrooms are awaking inside you. Don't get lost!
